attributes.action: enforce a net fishing total ban - by military force if necessary - within 12 miles of the mainland UK and Northern Ireland.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Our seas are being raped of fish and our seabed is being systematically destroyed by foreign bottom trawlers.  We have a Navy, we should be using it to stop any net fishing inside our international boundary.  Other countries do it so why not ours?
